data.name: Outnumbered
data.detailed_description:
Outnumbered is a game about destruction and battles against large armies. Survive and evolve your ship to dominate the battlefield.

Game Features

  • Choose out of over 100 Weapon and Defense Systems (Deck-Building and Credits System)
  • Multiple Game Modes (Time Survival, Hardcore, Sandbox, Mayhem)
  • Destroy hordes of enemies and bosses
  • Spawn and skill modifier randomization to create unique playthrough experiences
  • Top-Down Rogue-Lite Shooter Action
  • Optional Global, Community and Friend Leaderboards
data.about_the_game:
Outnumbered is a game about destruction and battles against large armies. Survive and evolve your ship to dominate the battlefield.

Game Features

  • Choose out of over 100 Weapon and Defense Systems (Deck-Building and Credits System)
  • Multiple Game Modes (Time Survival, Hardcore, Sandbox, Mayhem)
  • Destroy hordes of enemies and bosses
  • Spawn and skill modifier randomization to create unique playthrough experiences
  • Top-Down Rogue-Lite Shooter Action
  • Optional Global, Community and Friend Leaderboards
data.short_description: Outnumbered is a mass-enemy top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements. You may be greatly outnumbered, but not outpowered. Evolve into the ultimate weapon of destruction!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790S / AMD FX-9590
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290X
  • Additional Notes: Resolution of 1280x1024
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6900K / AMD Ryzen 5 3500X
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD RX 5700 XT.
  • Additional Notes: Resolution of 1920x1080
